name: Evolution (itch) (FriezeroGR)
description:
This game was made in 3 days for deku's 7th gamejam in scratch!

In this game you have to survive from bugs that want to eat you because you're a tiny little cell, so as you survive you'll grow at the same time and get bigger and bigger and at some point you'll get so big that you'll be fully grown. Don't go extinct!
